definitions.definition: ( transitive , rare ) To place (someone or something) in an in-between place, or condition or state , of neglect or oblivion which results in deadlock , delay , or some other unresolved status .

main_definition: ( transitive , rare ) To place (someone or something) in an in-between place, or condition or state , of neglect or oblivion which results in deadlock , delay , or some other unresolved status .

definitions.definition: To dance the limbo (etymology 2, noun sense 1 ) .
Often followed by under : to pass under something, especially while bending backwards .

main_definition: ( dance ) To dance the limbo (etymology 2, noun sense 1 ) .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , also figuratively ) Often followed by under : to pass under something, especially while bending backwards .
